name: Mr. Drillerâ„¢2
description: The world is once again threatened to be buried by a mysterious outbreak of coloured blocks. Only the heroic Mr. Driller can save the day! Or can he? Enter Anna Hottenmayer, a rival driller! As the original Mr. Driller or Anna, you must dig to safety, avoid falling blocks and scramble to reach air capsules to replenish your oxygen. Test your drill skills in three game modes: Mission Driller, Endless Driller and Time Attack Driller.
